links.title: Facebook reportedly gave personal data to 60 companies including Apple, Amazon and Samsung
links.description: Jim Watson | AFP | Getty Images Facebook struck dozens of data-sharing deals with smartphone and tablet makers over the last decade, according to a report by The New York Times. The newspaper revealed Sunday that Facebook had formed at least 60 data-sharing partnerships with device makers including Apple, Amazon, Microsoft and Samsung over the last 10 years.

messages.body: $AAPL In 2013, there were ~6.6B Apple shares. Today there are ~5.07B, a 23% reduction. Expect another 10-20% to be retired next few years.
